name: Robert's Betrayal
description:
Made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2

This game is not fully made, it's only for a game jam. Please enjoy gaming til' you've beaten your friend's high score!

How to Play:

The rules are simple: Hold space to move platforms up or down, click on a buildable green block to place them and have fun!

Story:

"ROBERT IS FOUNDED GUILTY!" The hammer went down following a loud thump. Robert was taken out, covered in blame and distrust. No one believed him. If only this didn't happen.

In the morning, Robert did his ordinary things, like fuelling up, changing metal and leaving his house. He looked and the magnificent view, drones tweeting, humans sleeping and the smell of fresh oil. It was perfect until a bullet swished right past his ear! And apparently, a gun was right in his hand.

Guilt, sorrow and boredom fell upon him. Why must this happen to him? The bomb went down following a loud thump. 

'An exit?' Robert thought to himself, trying not to speak. As he wheeled forward towards the exit, a sense came to him. A guard! It set off the emergency button and Robert's vision was disrupted. He also felt another sense. Not physically, but mentally. Like a rage, like a betrayal. Like Robert's Betrayal!
